meanings.definition: The quality of being outstanding or extremely good.
meanings.sent1: Her artwork displayed true excellence in every brushstroke.
meanings.sent2: The team celebrated their victory with excellence and pride.
meanings.sent3: The cat's naptime skills reached excellence levels, impressing everyone.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his craft was a shining example of excellence.
meanings.sent5: The sunsets in that painting were captured with pure excellence.

meanings.definition: A talent or quality which is unusually good and so surpasses ordinary standards.
meanings.sent1: His singing voice was a true excellence among the choir members.
meanings.sent2: The chef's culinary excellence was evident in every dish he prepared.
meanings.sent3: The dog's fetching skills reached excellence levels, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and compassion were an excellence that brightened everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's speed on the track was a display of sheer excellence.
